line.originaltext: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Measure flour, 1 cup sugar, baking powder, baking soda, 1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon, salt, buttermilk, oil, eggs and vanilla into large mixing bowl.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing2, ing3, ing4, ing5, ing6, ing7, ing8, ing9}, ing13, "stuff in mixing bowl", "")

line.originaltext: Measure flour, 1 cup sugar, baking powder, baking soda, 1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon, salt, buttermilk, oil, eggs and vanilla into large mixing bowl.
Measure flour, 1 cup sugar, baking powder, baking soda, 1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon, salt, buttermilk, oil, eggs and vanilla into large mixing bowl.

line.annotation: mix(ing13, t2, ing14, "beaten stuff in bowl", "beat 3 minutes")
do(ing14, t1, ing15, "smooth stuff in pan", "smooth top")

line.originaltext: Combine 2 tablespoons white sugar, 1 teaspoon cinnamon and butter, mixing until crumbly.
Combine 2 tablespoons white sugar, 1 teaspoon cinnamon and butter, mixing until crumbly.
Combine 2 tablespoons white sugar, 1 teaspoon cinnamon and butter, mixing until crumbly.

line.annotation: combine({ing15, ing17}, ing18, "everything in pan", "sprinkle topping over batter")

line.originaltext: Using knife, cut in a light swirling motion to give a marbled effect.
Using knife, cut in a light swirling motion to give a marbled effect.
line.annotation: cut(ing18, t3, ing19, "marbled batter", "cut in a light swirling motion")

line.originaltext: Using knife, cut in a light swirling motion to give a marbled effect.

line.annotation: do(ing20, t4, ing21, "tested batter", "test with toothpick")

line.originaltext: When inserted it should come out clean.
Remove bread from pan to rack to cool.
Remove bread from pan to rack to cool.
Remove bread from pan to rack to cool.
Remove bread from pan to rack to cool.
Remove bread from pan to rack to cool.
